sentences.english: Among ethnic groups, Bai , Bouyei and Miao people are also adept at embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 在民族，白族，布依族和苗族人还善于刺绣。

sentences.english: Brass drums are the Bouyei people's instruments of deity worshipping.
sentences.chinese: 铜鼓是布依族的神器礼器。

sentences.english: There are several types of ancient characters which are popular in Buyi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 布依族中流行着几种古文字类型。

sentences.english: There are specific cultural values in Bouyei's funeral ballad of Luoping County.
sentences.chinese: 罗平布依族丧葬歌谣具有特定的文化价值。

sentences.english: Bouyei is the southern minority in China.
sentences.chinese: 布依族是我国南方的少数民族。

sentences.english: Buyi is an ancient nationality of China.
sentences.chinese: 布依族是我国古老的民族。

sentences.english: There were three parts of development in Buyi novels.
sentences.chinese: 布依族小说的发展可分为三个阶段。

sentences.english: Mosque recently built by French Construction company Bouygues.
sentences.chinese: 最近建成的清真寺由法国布依格建筑公司。

sentences.english: Baiyue, an ancestry of the Bouyei, was one of the nationalities that were in possession of the earliest printing technologies in China.
sentences.chinese: 布依族先民百越是我国印染工艺起源最早的民族之一。
